setup-keys.description: Show exact key setup snippets for enabled plugins
setup-keys.template:
!`python3 "$HOME/.config/opencode/my_opencode/scripts/plugin_command.py" setup-keys`
Show only the command output.

plugin-help.description: Show plugin command usage and examples
plugin-help.template:
!`python3 "$HOME/.config/opencode/my_opencode/scripts/plugin_command.py" help`
